metadata.creator: Lisa Andrew; Mario Allende
metadata.description: The show begins with a Chilean Documentary Y tu que prefieres? to discuss the nature of sexuality; and the prevention of AIDS. In the documentary, Magaly Inostroza, Jose Aldunate, Alfonso Luca, Daniel Godoy, and teenagers analyzed this issue. The other half of the program is about Patricia Morales. She works for the Canadian Organization "Planet Parenthood" to raise HIV awarness to Secondary High schools, Edmonton Young Offender's Centre, and Sexual Assault Centres.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros.
metadata.subject: Sexuality; la Sexualidad; Prevention of HIV; la Prevencion del Sida; AIDS; Magaly Inostroza; Jose Aldunate; Alfonso Luca; Daniel Godoy; Planned Parenthood; Patricia Morales; Edmonton Schools; Edmonton Young Offender's Centre; Sexual Assault Centres
